div.p:
In order to develop an fhir application using the webservices of Abrumet, it is necessary to have the following material and information :
An eID card reader and the installed software Dioss middleware
A user within the Brusafe + platform This user is important in the context of the various patient tests, without this no data can be associated during a call to a web services
div.h3: How to register on the Brusafe+ Platform

p.li: Open your browser and please go to : https://auth.tst.brusafe.be/portal/patient/index.xhtml

Click on "Belgian eID". This user registration can only be done if you have a card reader and the Dioss Middleware software installed on your machine, an error message will warn you if this is not the case.
